title: How To Plan Your Dream Getaway
description: Author of “1000 Places to See Before You Die” Patricia Schultz discusses best adventures and tips for planning your bucket list dream destination adventure. Whether that be stateside or across the globe, it’s not out of the question - or out of your budget - to start planning now.
